Invocation Name: countdown widget
des:
Get Organized with the Customizable Countdown/Count-up Widget!

Ever forget an important event or struggle to keep track of deadlines? This widget is here to help! It's a completely voice-controlled tool that seamlessly integrates with your existing routines.

Here's how it works:

Simple Setup: Just enable the skill within your app. No complicated configuration needed!
Voice-Activated Customization:

Choose a Date: Simply say, "Alexa, open countdown widget set countdown for July 15th." You can choose future dates for exciting events or past dates for anniversaries or special occasions.

Set a Title: Tell Alexa something like, "Alexa, ask countdown widget to create a countdown called 'Beach Trip.'" This personalizes your countdown and makes it easy to identify later.

Automatic Updates: The skill keeps track of everything in the background. No need to manually update the countdown!

Visual Display (Optional): If you have compatible smart displays with Alexa, you can see the countdown visually alongside weather or other information.

Countdown or Count-up:

Countdown: Upcoming events are displayed as a countdown with days remaining. This keeps you on top of deadlines and builds anticipation for exciting events.

Count-up: For past dates, the skill automatically switches to a count-up mode, showing how much time has passed since that date.

Stay Organized and Informed: This skill widget is a convenient way to manage your time effectively. With voice commands and automatic updates, you'll never miss a beat!
